com.team30.game.game_mechanics

Class InfiltratorContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team30.game.game_mechanics.InfiltratorContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityContainer

    public class InfiltratorContainer
extends Object
implements EntityContainer
    Wrapper class for all infiltrators, and handles the movement and rendering of them

      • collisionCheck

        boolean collisionCheck(Auber auber,
                       Infiltrator infiltrator,
                       float range)
        Horrible logic statement for collision checking

        Consists of 4 parts
        If the leftmost auber point (including range) is less than the rightmost infiltrator point

        AND the leftmost infiltrator point is less than the rightmost auber point (including range)

        AND the lowest auber point (including range) is less than the topmost infiltrator point

        AND the lowest infiltrator point is less than the topmost auber point (including range)

        Parameters:
        auber - The player character to check a boundry around
        infiltrator - The infiltrator to check if it is insde the boundry box
        range - The range around the auber to check (in the x and y axis)
        Returns:
        True if the infiltrator is inside the collision box

      • checkCaptured

        public void checkCaptured(Auber auber)
        Deletes any infiltrators in range of the Auber
        Parameters:
        auber - - The entity to do collision checking on
